mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT p.order_detail_id, p.post_id, p.member_id, p.quantity, p.specialty_type, p.price pu_price, p.order_date, code_val(p.order_status) order_status, p.payment_id, p.tid, p.cid, p.cancel_amount, p.cancel_tax_free_amount, r.start_date, r.price pk_price, r.end_date, r.deadline_date, r.tour_theme, r.name, code_val(r.completion) completion FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN package_regist r ON (p.post_id = r.post_id) WHERE p.post_id LIKE 'PKG%' and member_id = #{buyVO.memberId} AND p.order_status = #{buyVO.orderStatus} ORDER BY p.order_date DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT p.order_detail_id, p.post_id, p.member_id, p.quantity, p.price, p.tid, p.cid, p.cancel_amount, p.cancel_tax_free_amount, p.order_date, p.order_status, p.payment_id, r.title, r.type, o.specialty_type FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN specialties_regist r ON (p.post_id = r.post_id) LEFT JOIN SPECIALTIES_option o ON (p.post_id = o.post_id) WHERE p.post_id LIKE 'SPE%' AND member_id = #{buyVO.memberId} AND p.order_status = #{buyVO.orderStatus} ORDER BY p.order_date DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }

SELECT p.order_detail_id, p.post_id, p.member_id, p.quantity, p.price pu_price, p.specialty_type, p.order_date, code_val(p.order_status) order_status, p.payment_id, p.tid, p.cid, p.cancel_amount, p.cancel_tax_free_amount, r.start_date, r.price pk_price, r.end_date, r.deadline_date, r.tour_theme, r.name, code_val(r.completion) completion, f.loading_img FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN package_regist r ON (p.post_id = r.post_id) JOIN attached_file f ON (p.post_id = f.post_id) WHERE f.img_type = 'U2' and p.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}

SELECT p.order_detail_id, p.post_id, p.member_id, p.quantity, p.price pu_price, p.specialty_type, p.order_date, code_val(p.order_status) order_status, p.payment_id, p.tid, p.cid, p.cancel_amount, p.cancel_tax_free_amount, r.title, r.type, o.price sp_pirce, o.specialty_type, o.price sp_price, f.loading_img FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN SPECIALTIES_REGIST r ON (p.post_id = r.post_id) LEFT JOIN SPECIALTIES_option o ON (p.post_id = o.post_id) LEFT JOIN attached_file f ON (p.post_id = f.post_id) WHERE f.img_type = 'U2' and p.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
